entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pemberton Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
